resources.string: Perfect Ingress Glyph Hacking: Catch incoming Glyphs and replace outgoing with them
Hack a key, even when using the Hack No Key option in the circle menu. Of course you can only get a key if you don\'t already have one.
Hack no key, even when using the Hack option in the circle menu or the Hack button in the portal dialog.
Automatically send a \'more\' glyph to request a key, even when you don\'t touch the command glyph or draw bullshit.
Automatically send a \'less\' glyph to request no key, even when you don\'t touch the command glyph or draw bullshit.
Automatically send a \'complex\' glyph to speed up the glyph sequence prompt. You have to touch the command glyph interface to trigger this!
Automatically send a \'simple\' glyph to slow down the glyph sequence prompt. You have to touch the command glyph interface to trigger this!

If you draw a correct \'more\' or \'less\' command glyph, it overrides the Glyph Hack Key configuration. And if you draw a correct \'complex\' or \'simple\' command glyph, it overrides the Glyph Hack Speed configuration. Key and speed overriding are also combinable.
If you like my work,\nplease donate me.\nThanks.
Xglyph v%1$s, %2$s\nDeveloped by xfunforx and Cypher\nThanks to San Atear
